sentences.sentence: Big-name jewellers are battling it out to get celebrities to wear their bling.
sentences.translation: 大牌珠宝商们为了让名人们戴他们的高档首饰正在一争高下。

sentences.sentence: Ok I got my bling money, now lets spend it!
sentences.translation: OK 我已经搞到钱了，现在让我们开始花吧！

sentences.sentence: Mother's day Gifts Today: Brunch, Bouquets, bling.
sentences.translation: 今天母亲节的礼物：早午餐、花束、珠宝。
